name: No Time For July
description:
- NOTE -

The opening cutscene comes with graphics but those do not seem to work in the web build for some reason, but everything else in the game does work.

- ABOUT -

No Time for July was made for ScoreSpace Jam 21. This was made across 2.5 days for the theme "bounce".

- CONTROLS -

WASD to move

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON to shoot egg

RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON to recall egg

TAB to redirect the egg

C to buy from shop

SPACE to dash (if you have the upgrade

- STORY -

July, the rabbit wizard, has their staff stolen by Master Time. In order to get it back, they enter a bet: if they can beat 3 levels of Master Time's tower then they win back their staff. If they lose, then Master Time takes all of the time left in July's life!

- CREDITS -
  • arkicade - Artist, Writer (minor Programming)
  • apilat - Programmer 
  • incomptech - Music
